label: Label
comment: An attachment to an object, person or animal which provides identification information for the object.

datatypeProperties.comment: The unique identifier of this logistics label.
The code specifying the layout type of this logistics label.
The unique identifier of the end of a series of logistics labels.
The unique identifier of the start of a series of logistics labels.
The code specifying the size of this logistics label.

objectProperties.comment: A section included in this logistics label.

referencedBy.comment: A barcode label that is a part of these logistics shipping marks.
A Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) label that is a part of these logistics shipping marks.
A logistics label, at line level, used for this trade delivery.
A Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) label that is a part of these logistics shipping marks.
